naslov: Luksuzna vila s bazenom, Krk, Malinska, PRILIKA, SNIŽENO (prodaja)
opis: Luksuzna vila s bazenom na otoku Krku, u Miholjicama - Malinska. Novogradnja koja je useljiva do ljeta 2025. godine. Dvojnica, etažnosti prizemlje i kat (P+1), tlocrtne površine 199,87 m2. Kuća s bazenom je smještena na parceli od 510m2 te ima svoja 2 parkirna mjesta. Bazen je veličine 22m2 (6,4m x3,4m). U prizemlju kuće je dnevni dio sa terasom, hodnikom, toaletom i ostavom. Na katu se nalaze 3 spavaće sobe svaka sa svojom kupaonom i terasom.Izvrsna svijetla keramika u kupaonama, podovi u spc materijalima, vrhunska unutarnja vrata i stolarija. Lijepa, mirna lokacija na svega 3 kilometra do prvih plaža. Čisto vlasništvo i uredni papiri gradnje. Luxury villa with pool on the island of Krk, in Miholjice - Malinska. New construction that can be moved into by the summer of 2025. Semi-detached house, ground floor and first floor (P+1), floor plan area 199.87 m2. The house with a swimming pool is located on a plot of 510 m2 and has its own 2 parking spaces. The size of the pool is 22m2 (6.4m x 3.4m). On the ground floor of the house there is a living room with a terrace, a corridor, a toilet and a storage room. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and terrace. SPC floors, top-quality light ceramics in the bathrooms, beautiful interior doors and excellent joinery. Beautiful, quiet location only 3 kilometers from the first beaches. Clean ownership and proper construction papers.
